episode_event_academy_academy_sub01/8301:
I am thankful we have a place where we can
cultivate our knowledge.

Now that I—Maxie—can teach from behind a
podium, Pasio shall make further advances in
science!
episode_event_academy_academy_sub01/8302:
I found a wall that looked perfect for climbing,
so that’s what I did. Next thing I knew, I was on
the roof!

Please keep this a secret from the teachers...
I don’t want to get scolded.
episode_event_academy_academy_sub01/8303: The tea here is quite tasty.

It’s nothing compared to the tea Darach serves,
though. Hehe.
episode_event_academy_academy_sub01/8304: The library here has my novels.

I’m not sure how useful they’ll be for your studies,
but feel free to read them whenever you like.
episode_event_academy_academy_sub01/8305:
If I just scatter around some Toxic Spikes before
class, then I’ll have an epic advantage and—
I-I haven’t done anything yet... Ahaha...
